alert.note: Alert for Madison; Sharkey; Yazoo (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 06 at 3:56PM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Yazoo, southeastern Sharkey and west central Madison Counties through 500 PM CDT... At 355 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Myrleville to near Tinsley to near Cary. Movement was southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Myrleville around 400 PM CDT. Satartia and Tinsley around 405 PM CDT. Little Yazoo around 425 PM CDT. Bentonia around 435 PM CDT. Flora and Phoenix around 500 PM CDT. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. These storms may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.
